name: Orc Slayer
overview: Following the slaying of your family by the Death Moon Tribe of Orcs you vow to avenge their deaths by destroying Thorg their leader. Your relentless search will take you through the Maze of Desperation and beyond trying to locate the magic Runesword needed to kill your sworn enemy. You learn that the Orcs underground stronghold lies somewhere in the Savage Lands beyond the mighty Azonti River. Driven on, you know that you cannot stop until either you or Thorg lay dead. Featuring a comprehensive vocabulary and the ability to SAVE/LOAD an unfinished game, this 48K text adventure will push you to the limit of your wits and intelligence in achieving your goal.
